input.sentences: the family sat down and watched a slide show looking back at all their fondest memories .
they saw pictures of their parents when they were younger
and then they saw pictures of their grandparents form years ago .
they drank coffee and laughed at how silly fashions were back then

especially wedding dresses . they saw the picture of grandma 's wedding dress and thought it looked ridiculous ! the family loved the trip down memory lane and felt like it had brought them all closer together .
output.sentences: Yesterday, my grandparents had us sit and watch a slide show.
The pics were so old, we suggested that they be changed to a digital format.
It's easy to form an idea of a grandparent and then you see their old pictures and discover they are a lot like you.
Some of the fashions seemed silly to us and we laughed quietly, away from Gramps and Grandma.
This kind of rediculous wedding photo is all that is left of my Grandma's first wedding, that happened on a trip to Vegas.
